title: ROPE AND SKIN  - Shogoro Nishimura 1979 -
description:
ROPE AND SKIN aka DAN ONIROKU: NAWA TO HADA
Japan 1979, Shogoro Nishimura
70 Mins, Adults only!!!

Japanese with hardcoded English subs.

Nasty PINKU EIGA flick... 
WARNING: EXPLOITATION TO THE MAX!!! 

Woman gambler Okoma deals her final game, before her retirement from the yakuza world, and offends a rival gang. 
They in turn kill her husband-to-be, assassinates the local big boss in order to take control the area and kidnap his daughter. 
Okoma decides to take revenge and is captured by the gang and sadistically abused.

Great pinku eiga flick.

Solid Action-Based Nikkatsu Sleazer....
